 2024-09782024-08-28PCH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ALISON MURAWSKY of Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ALISON MURAWSKY of Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
